listitem.para: Whether or not to send IKEv2 REDIRECT notify payloads (RFC 5685) in IKE_AUTH reply (so called connection based redirects). Typical use case for this is clients-server use case, where the server is the one redirecting clients to other gateway. Accepted values are auto (the default), where auto currently means send payload if DDoS defence mechanism is active, no (never send) and yes (always send).
